title: Bubble Shooter
description: Bubble Shooter is a classic arcade game where players aim and shoot colored bubbles to create groups of three or more of the same color, causing them to pop and clear from the board. The objective is to clear all the bubbles before they reach the bottom of the screen. The game features multiple levels with increasing difficulty, power-ups, and a variety of bubble colors to keep players engaged and challenged.
tech: Canvas API for rendering the game graphics and animations
Collision detection algorithms for bubble interactions
Event handling for user input and game controls
